feature.label: EMF Facet SDK Source
feature.description: EMF Facet provides non-intrusive mechanisms to add new features (types, attributes, references and operations) to an EMF meta-model and to customize displaying of the EObjects (icons, labels, etc.). This feature contains all the user plug-ins of EMF Facet.
